title: ADR Frontmatter Schema
description: Canonical frontmatter schema for CLEO Architecture Decision Records. All status values must match the architecture_decisions SQLite table enum exactly.

Date.description: ADR creation date in YYYY-MM-DD format

Status.description: Lifecycle status. Must match architecture_decisions DB enum exactly (lowercase only).

Accepted.description: Date accepted in YYYY-MM-DD format. Required when Status=accepted.

Supersedes.description: Comma-separated ADR IDs this supersedes (e.g., 'ADR-001, ADR-002'). Required when this supersedes others.

Superseded By.description: ADR ID that supersedes this one (e.g., 'ADR-017'). Required when Status=superseded.

Amends.description: ADR ID(s) this partially amends (e.g., 'ADR-006 (§3))'). Partial amendment — scope-limited change to one section.

Amended By.description: Comma-separated ADR IDs that partially amend this one. Inverse of Amends.

Related Tasks.description: Comma-separated related CLEO task IDs (e.g., 'T4732, T4791'). Unified replacement for: Task, Epic, References, Research, Related Epics.

Gate.description: Gate type required before implementation. Use instead of prose conditions in Status field.

Summary.description: 1-3 sentence plain-language description of the decision. Enables cognitive search across ADRs without reading full content.

Keywords.description: Comma-separated freeform tags (e.g., 'sqlite, storage, migration'). Used for fuzzy search.

Topics.description: Comma-separated canonical CLEO domain tags from: tasks, session, memory, check, pipeline, orchestrate, tools, admin, nexus, storage, testing, migration, naming, security, performance.
